This noncomedogenic, skin-nourishing formula won’t clog pores. It wears comfortably throughout the day with a lightweight feel that won’t fade or disappear. Antioxidant rich, skin balancing oils—including abyssinica and camellia oils, and hydrating shea butter—help support the skin’s moisture barrier for a supple, youthful appearance. With this formula, you can achieve full coverage with a natural, skin-like finish that never looks cakey or dry.

What else you need to know:
This product is cruelty-free, noncomedogenic, silicone-free, isododecane-free, perfume-free, and non-toxic.

As this formula contains no suspenders or fillers, you may notice a slight marbling on the wall of your bottle. Because this is a high-pigment formula, as you shake and use your product, it may retain a pigmentation stain on the wall of the bottle. This will not affect the product inside or the way it pumps out.

Label: face
name: Neo Nude Fusion Powder
description:
What it is:
A finishing powder with the practicality of a compact and the luminosity of a liquid foundation, giving you the best of both worlds on-the-go.

What it does:
NEO NUDE FUSION POWDER is the first finishing powder to combine similar ingredients to a luminous liquid foundation, with the clean application and nomadic practicality of a compact. Backed by 10 years of research, NEO NUDE FUSION POWDER features two of Giorgio Armani’s new, groundbreaking, patented technologies.

Available in 12 shades, NEO NUDE FUSION POWDER contains a high-performance color fusion emulsion with advanced pigments that maintain a skin-matching veil, which stays true no matter how many touch-ups you make throughout the day.

Floating weightlessly onto the skin like a cloud, the secret to its brilliance lies in Giorgio Armani beauty Laboratories’ new patent: the water memory formulation process. During formulation, water within the powder evaporates, leaving a powder texture behind. Upon contact with the natural moisture found within the skin, the process is reversed: the powder transforms into a veil-like liquid that becomes one with the skin, avoiding harsh lines, smears or caking over time. A second patent creates a soft, weightless powder—so thin it appears invisible. The result is a look that’s you, but better—it’s your Armani nude.

What else you need to know:
Giorgio Armani beauty introduces a complete NEO NUDE range for skin, cheeks, and lips, with the promise of “no makeup makeup” perfection. Invisible, mistake-proof, and sensorial—it delivers everything a woman needs to feel confident and to embody the signature Armani glow.

This silky, soft-lit loose powder blends effortlessly onto skin with a glimmering finish. This versatile powder can be used to illuminate and accentuate the high points of the face and décolleté.

What else you need to know:
This shimmery powder delivers a natural, soft glow to blur the look of imperfections. Use it to accentuate cheeks with a wash of color, or apply it to the high points of the face and décolleté to illuminate skin.

Orgasm is the perfect blend of peachy pink with golden shimmer to achieve naturally flushed cheeks. The iconic shade has been an award-winning editors’ pick, pro favorite, and a makeup artist kit staple for years.

This formula is oil-, talc-, and fragrance-free.

"When I created Orgasm, I wanted a shade that everyone could wear."—François Nars, Brand Founder and Creative Director

Label: face
name: All Nighter Pollution Protection Makeup Setting Spray Environmental Defense
description:
What it is:
A makeup setting spray infused with minerals that help shield against environmental damage.

What it does:
Make your makeup last up to 16 hours and help protect against oxidation due to pollution. Urban Decay’s All Nighter Pollution Protection mists on weightlessly to keep makeup looking just-applied, without melting, fading, or settling into fine lines. UD’s light-as-air formula acts like a protective barrier throughout the day—to guard skin against whatever the day throws at it.

UD’s legendary original All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray has kept millions of faces looking fresh until dawn. They took their groundbreaking, award-winning formula and infused it with minerals that shield against environmental damage. Because the thought of pollutants wreaking havoc on your skin every day isn’t pretty.

All Nighter Pollution Protection contains a blend of minerals—including zinc, magnesium, and copper—that protect against free radicals. UD’s setting sprays are the only sprays on the market with their patented, time-release Temperature Control Technology, which actually lowers the temperature of your makeup to help it last longer.

While many setting sprays feel sticky or tight on the skin, All Nighter Pollution Protection feel amazing. Once you’ve applied this spray, you won’t even know it’s there (until you look in the mirror to touch up your makeup, and realize you don’t need to). The sprayer provides the lightest, finest mist. It always feels airy—never like a squirt in the face.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Urban Decay is 100 percent cruelty-free.

Research results:
In a 53-subject clinical study of All Nighter Pollution Protection:
Immediately after use:
- 96% said the formula was lightweight and breathable

After 16 hours of use:
- 90% of participants said their makeup stayed on for 16 hours
- 90% said the product kept their makeup looking freshly applied
- 90% said the product didn’t settle into fine lines after 16 hours
ingredients: Aqua / Water, Alcohol Denat., PVP, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Zinc Gluconate, Magnesium Aspartate, Phenylpropanol, Propanediol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum / Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Copper Gluconate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Maltodextrin, Poloxamer 407, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, BHT.

Label: face
name: Ambient Light Correcting Primer
description:
What it is:
A light correcting primer to blur, smooth, and perfect the skin for a soft, subtle glow.

What it does:
Ambient® Light Correcting Primer is infused with light correcting pigments that act as a first filter to neutralize, brighten, and soften light. It blurs imperfections and smooths the skin’s texture for flawless makeup application. This primer creates a better starting point for makeup application, or it can simply be worn alone. Unlike other primers, the oil-free, weightless formula instantly absorbs into the skin, imparting a natural-looking glow without feeling wet or greasy. It’s designed to further enhance the lighting effects of the Ambient Lighting Collection by creating the first layer of light.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Hourglass developed this formula to prime skin and create the perfect canvas for the Ambient Lighting Collection. The first-of-its-kind formula was developed to create the thinnest layer of light-enhancing particles, which allows for layering without re-emulsifying the layer underneath. This results in the most weightless lighting effect on the skin. This breakthrough primer creates the ideal base for light diffusion and refraction while also prepping the skin for makeup application.

Hourglass products are 100 percent cruelty-free.

"This primer is a multi-tasker. I wear it alone on days where I just need a little something to walk out the door, and under foundation on other days when I want to really perfect my lighting. The texture is so different than anything else on the market—it feels like I have nothing on, but it does so much."—Carisa Janes, Hourglass Founder

Label: face
name: 158 Double Ended Sculpting Brush
description:
What it is:
A must-have, dual-purpose brush featuring a rounded end and an angled end.

What it does:
Boasting two brushes in one, this double-ended brush is the perfect tool for powder application and sculpting. Use the rounded side, with has both straight and wavy fibers, for traditional powder application or highlighting. The angled side, which features wavy fibers, is perfect for sculpting the cheekbones. This brush can be used with loose and compact powders.

What else you need to know:
After five years in development with makeup artists and fiber experts, MAKE UP FOR EVER Artisan Brushes are a revolution in brush craftsmanship. The 100-percent fiber brushes are available in a range of 76 handcrafted styles, each with the perfect balance of straight and wavy fibers that replicate natural hairs. Beveled tips create a two-in-one makeup brush and tool, while innovative hair density and brush head shapes optimize every stroke for ideal makeup application. To achieve the ultimate collection, every brush has gone through 25 production stages by 30 craftsmen and has been checked for quality 50 times.

name: Age Defense BB Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 30
description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Combination
✔ DryWhat it is:
A powerful balm to perfect the appearance of skin.

What it is formulated to do:
- Antioxidants to prevent and banish imperfections
- Features SPF 30 sun protection
- Comes in four shades

This instant morning routine gives skin just about everything it needs for a quick start: SPF protection, antioxidants for prevention, and just enough coverage to banish imperfections. In addition to these beneficial factors, it makes the perfect primer, too.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Beauty Balms or BB Creams were originally developed as a perfect post-procedure cream used to treat, hydrate, prime, protect, and camouflage the skin. Great for all skin types including those with sensitive skin, these versatile “five-in-one” formulas are designed to do it all: treat with high levels of active skin care ingredients; moisturize and smooth dehydrated skin; prime and perfect skin’s surface; camouflage and color correct the skintone; and protect skin from the sun with SPF. They can be used as a last step for their skin care benefits or used on their own as an instant beautifier.

Complexions with very fair to pink undertones, use Shade 01. Very fair, moderately fair, and golden undertones, use Shade 02. Moderately fair to medium complexions with golden undertones, use Shade 03. Golden to deeper skin tones, use Shade 04.

What it is: An ultra-sheer, highlighting balm enriched with BECCA’s Glow Nectar Brightening Complex to create a dewy glow.

What it does:
This is like a post-facial glow in a stick. The ultra-sheer, translucent highlighter imparts a dewy, glass-like sheen to the skin. It is enriched with BECCA’s Glow Nectar Brightening Complex—bitter ginger and a cold-pressed avocado and melon blend—for healthier-looking, more radiant skin. One universal shade creates a glass-like, ethereal glow on all skin tones.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: Infused in all of BECCA’s Skin Love products, Glow Nectar Brightening Complex’s blend of powerful actives and natural ingredients help brighten, hydrate and soothe the skin over time to support your natural glow.

Label: face
name: Dewy Stix - Luminous Highlighting Balm
description:
What it is:
A highlighting balm that adds a gorgeous wet dewy glow to any skintone.

What it does:
Instantly bring a lit-from-within-glow to your complexion with this low shimmer, dewy, wet-look illuminator. Formulated with murumuru butter and hyaluronic acid, this weightless, non-tacky balm provides natural, healthy-looking radiance on any skin. It’s the perfect finishing touch on bare skin or on top of makeup.

The balm’s unique formulation has been perfected to ensure maximum comfort and longevity. The convenient stick makes it easy to get a glow on the go with a brushless application. Apply directly on bare skin to impart a fresh, dewy finish, or if wearing on top of makeup, swipe fingers over the balm, and then place it on your skin using the pads of the fingers in a rolling motion. Try sweeping your favorite powder highlighter over the top to amplify your radiance.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Skin will be treated to a natural-looking dewy finish that’s never tacky or sticky to touch. Ciaté London is a PETA approved, cruelty-free brand. This product is gluten-free.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

✔ Normal

What it is:
A makeup priming, holographic highlighting treatment oil powered by Josie's quick-absorbing 100% Pure Argan Oil Light and pore-smoothing priming pearls for boosted elasticity, glowy radiance, and makeup-ready skin.

Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
Get a holographic moonlit glow with Josie's weightless moonstone potion that highlights, primes, hydrates, and smooths. Argan-powered essential nutrients nourish and treat the skin while multicolored coated priming pearls illuminate and awaken your complexion. Easily transform any look with these iridescent drops: mix with your foundation for a perfectly dewy look, add a few to your lips for a glowing pout, or bring extra light to cheekbones with one single drop. 100% Pure Argan Oil Light nourishes and hydrates while PhytoVie Defense®, a plant-based antioxidant, helps fight against skin-aging free radical damage and extends makeup wear. Lemongrass lavender essential oils enahnce your mood and calm inflammation and redness. Skin is left juicy, glowing, protected, and smooth. Let's glow to the moon.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without gluten, GMO, synthetic fragrance, and formaldehyde.

Beauty tips:
- Wear alone as a daily hydrator or on top of serums and creams to seal in skincare
- Use as a makeup primer
- Apply to lips to condition and prime
- Apply a drop on top of satin and matte lippies to add luster and radiance
- Mix with foundation, serums, and moisturizers
- Use as an under-eye treatment to brighten and diffuse fine lines and dark circles
- Use as a highlighter: on the cheekbones, down the nose, in the corners of the eye
- Use as an illuminating body oil
- Use as a nourishing hair oil to add shine

Clean at Sephora
When you spot our Clean seal, you can be sure we’ve checked that this brand’s product is made without the ingredients you told us you’d most like to avoid.

Clean at Sephora™ is formulated without:
Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban. All skincare, hair, and makeup brands with the Clean Seal have less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

name: Secret Camouflage Concealer
description:
What it is:
A two-shade concealer that can be color-customized to address your tone and imperfections.

What it does:
A beauty editor and makeup artist favorite, this customizable concealer naturally and completely covers dark circles, blemishes, scars, minor imperfections, and discolorations with a unique two-shade system. One shade is formulated to match skin’s depth of color, while the other matches skin’s undertone. This dual-shade camouflage makes it possible for everyone to custom-blend her own perfect shade. Always apply after foundation; the high-level of pigment requires very little product to achieve perfect coverage that lasts for up to eight hours.

What else you need to know:
This dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic product is oil-free and contains soothing aloe and chamomile extracts and skin-conditioning vitamins A, C, and E. It is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive ones.

"I use two shades of concealer…a lighter shade around my eyes to hide any darkness (ugh!) and then another darker shade that matches my face. I love that this looks like second skin and covers all day."—Taylor, NUDESTIX Model

Label: face
name: Météorites Primer Perfecting Pearls
description:
What it is:
A color-correcting and radiance-boosting primer.

What it does:
Météorites Primer smooths and color-corrects your skin tone for a radiant complexion. Infused with a delicate violet scent, it’s formulated with Guerlain’s signature Stardust Technology: a unique complex encapsulating a celestial powder that transforms light invisible to the naked eye into visible and soft-focus perfecting light to blur imperfections and provide exceptional radiance. The fresh gel texture melts with the rosy pearls to give skin a radiant and glowing finish, while neutralizing excess sebum for a long-lasting matte complexion. Highly concentrated pearls containing multi-colored, micro-shimmer particles amplify light reflection to create an illuminating, color-corrective light for your complexion. The absorbent powders neutralize excess oil while a special polymer helps to fade imperfections and smooth fine lines for a long-lasting, matte and even complexion.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This essential primer and ultimate radiance booster, Météorites Base returns with a new formula presented in a new sleek, facetted, crystalline case.

name: Ultra HD Skin Booster

It illuminates skin to prep it for makeup application, and its expertly designed, drop applicator provides the perfect amount of product. Apply before your favorite primer formula to make your makeup work even harder. The result is a perfectly smooth canvas ready for makeup application.

- Parabens

If you want to know more…
Developed with plastic surgeons, this innovative formula is your complexion perfection and sun protection in just one step. It gives your skin a boost of clinically tested hydration, while SPF 50+ broad-spectrum physical sunscreen protects against UVA and UVB rays, helping to prevent collagen damage and hyperpigmentation.

Formulated with revolutionary skin-perfecting technology and antiaging ingredients—including peptides, niacin, hydrolyzed collagen, and hyaluronic acid—this Color-Infused Skin Care™ optically blurs away discolorations and imperfections for flawless results. Ideal for every skin type, the universal color-correcting pigments even the appearance of all skin tones.

- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

This product was developed with the help of plastic surgeons and dermatologists. It is clinically tested, cruelty-free, and formulated without talc. The Skin Cancer Foundation recommends this product as an effective broad-spectrum sunscreen.

- 100% of participants reported measured increase in hydration
- 96% of participants reported soft and smooth skin
- 85% of participants reported improvement in skin texture
- 73% of participants reported skin felt younger and healthier

Label: face
name: All Nighter Waterproof Full-Coverage Concealer
description:
What it is:
A full-coverage concealer inspired by Urban Decay’s bestselling All Nighter Liquid Foundation.

What it does:
Urban Decay’s All Nighter Waterproof Full-Coverage Concealer provides flawless matte coverage that lasts all day and all night. Cover anything and get a perfectly blown-out effect. UD’s ultra-pigmented, blendable formula controls shine and masks imperfections for up to 24 hours, and the beautiful, modern-matte finish never looks overdone.

Just like All Nighter Liquid Foundation, All Nighter Concealer covers everything—and lasts through whatever kind of trouble you might find. It hides even the most hard-to-cover spots and sins from the night before, and UD’s waterproof formula stays put until the morning light. Plus, All Nighter Concealer absorbs oil to keep skin looking beautifully matte.

A major problem solver, All Nighter Concealer handles all your hardest-to-hide trouble spots: dark circles, blemishes, and discoloration. It even covers tattoos. This formula works beautifully with All Nighter Liquid Foundation or Naked Skin Liquid Makeup. With meticulously calibrated shades that span the complexion spectrum from pale to deep, All Nighter Concealer has every skin tone covered.

There’s no need to build your coverage or apply multiple layers. Always use All Nighter Concealer after you put on your foundation. Just apply a tiny amount and gently tap it into skin with your finger, the UD Pro Concealer Brush, or the UD Pro The Finger Brush (brushes sold separately) for beautiful results.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
This long-lasting formula provides much higher coverage than Naked Skin Concealer. That’s because UD increased the pigment level by 73 percent. A high-tech blend of polymers and humectants provides ultra-long, flawless wear and prevents All Nighter Concealer from settling into fine lines and pores. Just like All Nighter Liquid Foundation, this formula features light-diffusing pigments to blur flaws for a soft-focus effect.

All Nighter Concealer comes in a gorgeous bottle that’s like a little, covetable version of UD’s All Nighter Liquid Foundation component—with a luxurious, highly metallized gunmetal effect and asymmetric cutouts. As beautiful as the component is, it’s also practical and travel-friendly. No need to carry a brush. The angled, flocked paddle applicator has a little well at the end that provides a precise laydown of product exactly where you need it.

Urban Decay is 100 percent cruelty-free.
ingredients: Aqua / Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, Silica, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Hexyl Laurate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. What it is: A corrector that’s more than just a violet primer, it revives dull, tired skin while evening your overall complexion for a naturally radiant look.

Coverage: Light

Finish: Radiant

Formulation: Cream

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

SPF: SPF 25

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Licorice Root Extract: Helps brighten the look of skin.
- Centella Asiatica: Helps soothe skin.
- Violet Pigments: Helps neutralize yellow and olive undertones.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban.

What Else You Need to Know: This multi-use formula uses violet pigments to correct yellow and grey undertones, while licorice root extract from Korea boosts skin luminosity. Its lightweight coverage helps even out your complexion for an illuminating, natural finish, while protecting skin using broad-spectrum SPF 25.

Clinical Results: In an independent consumer use test on 30 participants:
- 93% felt that this product helped to correct dullness and gave a natural brightening effect immediately after application.
- 90% felt this product helped to correct dullness and kept skin moisturized after a month of application.
ingredients:

-Violet Pigments: Helps neutralize yellow and olive undertones.

Label: face
name: Magic Mattifying Balm & Blotting Sheet Duo
description:
What it is:
A two-in-one stick mattifier with built-in blotting sheets.

What it does:
The Magic Mattifying Balm & Blotting Sheet Duo features one side with a mattifying, lightweight balm that glides onto skin to erase shine and pores, priming, and setting makeup for extended wear. It’s velvety soft, transparent, and undetectable, and it’s ideal for all skin types. Side two features our hidden, innovative blotting sheets which you can custom size. The blotting sheets are the perfect tool for absorbing shine and oil throughout the day, during travel, or after the gym. This mattifying duo can be used in place of traditional pressed powders to absorb oil and shine without leaving traces of powder behind. Its custom, magnetic sealing cap keeps your makeup travel-friendly and spill-proof while the built-in trèSwitch Refill Blotting Sheets allow for easy, on-the-go use.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
TrèStiQue creates everyday two-in-one beauty essentials that simplify how you use, carry, apply makeup for life on-the-go.

"Our Magic Mattifying Balm & Blotting Sheet Duo is a product I have been dreaming of creating for forever! I love how compact and cool it is! I travel with this and use it after the gym to reduce shine and oil."—Jennifer Kapahi, Co-founder

This product is cruelty-free and is free of synthetic fragrances, D5, petrochemicals, and talc.
ingredients:
-Cucumber Extract: Rich in vitamins and minerals.

Mattifying Stick:
Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyethylene, Dimethicone, Mica, Dicalcium Phosphate Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Bht +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 15985/Yellow 6 Lake.

Label: face
name: Retouching Face Pencil
description:
What it is:
A collection of creamy, multitasking concealer pencils that lighten shadows, cover dark spots and neutralize redness for a naturally retouched look.

What it does:
The Retouching Face Pencil offers a full range of shades that are designed to make it easy to perfect all skin tones. The creamy formula glides on comfortably and blends seamlessly for the most skin-like finish. Use it on bare skin as an all-in-one skin perfector, or layer it over foundation for added coverage where you need it most. The result is a natural look on skin that's never cakey. Try using the Illuminate Pencil to create a subtle strobing effect—just swipe it on the high points of the face and blend it in with your fingers.

What else you need to know:
This collection also includes an Illuminate Pencil that is ideal for all skin tones. Use it for highlighting cheekbones, the inner corners of the eyes, or brow bones—and any feature you want to spotlight your features.

Label: face
name: Superprimer Face Primer - Colour Corrects Redness
description:
What it is:
A color-correcting primer that preps the face for makeup application and wear.

What it does:
This lightweight, oil-free primer helps create a smooth, even canvas for foundation. It color corrects for a range of complexion concerns, especially redness, so makeup glides on evenly and stays true for a neutral, even start.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Which one to use depends on your skin. There’s a Superprimer for redness, dullness, discoloration, and sallowness. If you have more than one skin concern, we recommend using a Superprimer to address one issue and a foundation to address the other.

If you simply want allover smoothing before foundation, try our Universal Superprimer, which preps skin beautifully for makeup. It is translucent, so wearing it alone is an option if you’re pressed for time, but for best results, team Superprimer with foundation for a flawless look.

Label: face
name: Diaphane Loose Powder Cartridge
description:
What it is:
A loose powder refill for Surratt’s Diaphane Loose Powder Compact to set makeup and give skin a picture-perfect finish.

What it does:
This Loose Powder Refill Cartridge is designed to hold the Diaphane Loose Powder Compact. Easy to refill, the Refill Cartridge is made to be inserted into the center of the Loose Powder Compact—and then just click it into place.

Swept over skin, the vapor-light, translucent, Diaphane Loose Powder locks makeup in place, soaks up shine, and makes pores disappear. A built-in mesh filter prevents the chic black puff from picking up excess powder so you never use too much. The Matte powder instantly reduces shine, while the Ecletante powder leaves skin glowing.

What else you need to know:
This refill cartridge is designed for use with the Surratt Beauty Diaphane Loose Powder Compact (sold separately). Surratt Beauty is dedicated to the Japanese tradition of minimal elegance; the space-saving packaging is designed to be lightweight and secure, and it is recyclable.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Beauty tip:
Focus on the T-zone and areas with excess shine, as well as where you want to diminish pore size, like the apples of the cheeks and tip of the nose.

This all-in-one palette of buttery, soft highlighters, blushes, and bronzers easily creates a complete look all on its own. Perfectly paired matte blush and bronzing shades balance the look by bringing warmth to skin for a cozy holiday glow.

Label: face
name: Bienfait Teinté Beauty Balm Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30
description:
Skin type:
✔ Normal
✔ Dry
✔ Combination
✔ Oily

What it is:
An ultimate multitasker that hydrates, protects, and evens skintone in just one step.

What it is formulated to do:
- Provides 24 hours of hydration
- Features SPF 30 sun protection
- Comes in six shades

This must-have Beauty Balm offers 24 hours of hydration without a greasy feel for lasting comfort. It protects your skin from environmental damage and reveals a smoother, healthier-looking complexion. Featuring the hydration and protection of only the very best skin care, it offers light coverage for an even skintone. It Includes antioxidants and a complex of nurturing vitamins E, B5, and CG for women of all ages, skin types, and skintones.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Beauty Balms or BB Creams were originally developed as a perfect post-procedure cream used to treat, hydrate, prime, protect, and camouflage the skin. Great for all skin types including those with sensitive skin, these versatile “five-in-one” formulas are designed to do it all: treat with high levels of active skin care ingredients; moisturize and smooth dehydrated skin; prime and perfect skin’s surface; camouflage and color correct the skintone; and protect skin from the sun with SPF. They can be used as a last step for their skin care benefits or used on their own as an instant beautifier.
ingredients:
-Antioxidants, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Vitamin CG
-Octinoxate 7.5%
-Titanium Dioxide 5.8%

What it is:
A light-to-medium coverage liquid foundation with broad-spectrum SPF 15 sun protection.

What it does:
Benefit’s new Hello Happy Soft Blur Foundation evens out the look of skin tone and blurs imperfections with soft-focus optical blurring spheres. The lightweight, buildable formula is easy to apply and flashback free, plus it contains shea extract, an ingredient known to smooth the look of skin and help protect it*. With a natural-matte finish and light-to-medium coverage, Hello Happy Soft Blur Foundation looks like skin and feels like nothing at all. It’s available in 12 easy-to-choose shades that let a range of skin tones put on a happy face.

*In vitro test on ingredient

Beauty Tip:
To create a smoother-than-smooth canvas for makeup, start your look with Benefit’s bestselling the POREfessional Face Primer (sold separately), then layer Hello Happy Soft Blur Foundation on top.

Research results:
In a self-evaluation by 103 women after 1 week:
- 99% said it feels weightless
- 98% said it feels breathable
- 96% said it blurs imperfections
- 95% said it gives natural-looking coverage

Label: face
name: Cool AF Lava Water Foundation
description:
What it is: A full-coverage, matte, liquid foundation that’s cooling, lightweight, and long-wearing for naturally flawless-looking skin.

Coverage: Full

Finish: Matte

Formulation: Liquid

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Lava Water: A natural resource from the base of volcanic ruins in the Jeju Islands, it helps to improve the overall condition of the skin and provides environmental defense; filled with minerals and nutrient salts, it provides anti-oxidation and supports natural cell production.
- Charcoal Powder: Absorbs harmful substances from the skin such as minerals and toxins, leaving a clearer, stronger, and healthier surface.
- Sodium Hyaluronate: Holding up to 1,000 times its weight in water, it helps boost skin’s moisture content, promote visible firmness, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with detoxifying charcoal powder and hydrating moringa butter, this refreshing formula will cover imperfections and even out your complexion. Exotic volcanic lava water sourced from the Jeju Island delivers antioxidants, minerals, and nutrients that nourish, keeping your skin supple and strong.
